alert.note: Alert for Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 26 at 4:12AM EDT until April 26 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT /7 AM CDT/ THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29. * WHERE...Portions of northern Indiana, southwest Michigan and northwest Ohio. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT /7 AM CDT/ this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Branch; Cass; Hillsdale; Northern Berrien; Southern Berrien; St. Joseph
